===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|古|攴|alt2=攵|c1=p|c2=s|ls=psc}}.<!--The gloss should actually say what the actual semantic meaning is (not just a listing of the character with no further explanation), otherwise the etymology is incomplete and our users are left wondering.-->

===Etymology===
Derivative of {{och-l|古|old}}. The sense “cause, reason” may be related too (“thing or person of former times”), or the same word as {{och-l|固|solid, secure, sure}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler 2007, ''apud'' Pulleyblank 1989}}).
